bioconda.name: bioconductor-seqlogo
bioconda.summary: Sequence logos for DNA sequence alignments

biocontainers.name: seqlogo
biocontainers.summary: Python port of the r bioconductor `seqlogo` package

biotools.summary: This tool takes the position weight matrix of a DNA sequence motif and plots the corresponding sequence logo as introduced by Schneider and Stephens (1990).

bioschemas.name: seqLogo
bioschemas.summary: This tool takes the position weight matrix of a DNA sequence motif and plots the corresponding sequence logo as introduced by Schneider and Stephens (1990).
